channel.title: I am desperate.... please help
channel.description:
Well a few questions, ive looked everywhere, no answer...
this is for a 562.
1. How do i add the ::char command
2. How do i make admins use :: instead of ` as their command line, because ` doesnt allow yell.
3. how do i change the words "follow" in a player, because i wana rename the "request assist" thing.
il beg for an answer now cuz ive looked everyhwere. if u can help even with 1 il be so thankful and rep. :)

item.title: I am desperate.... please help
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

to add a command you go to src>com>rs2hd>packethandler then you add the command to both CommandPacketHandler and CommandsPacketHandler, you place it under another command, just search if (cmd[0].equals and then it should bring up a command, add the ::char command under one of those.

I am having the same problem with the :: and `, i was told that it is not possible.

Go to ActionSender.java and search something like sendPlayerOption(“Follow”, 2, false); then change what’s in the quotes, save, compile, reset.

Hope i helped!

EDIT: thanks for the rep ^^

Read full topic
